Name: Dineshkumar Ponnusamy
AboutMe: Dineshkumar Ponnusamy (தினேஷ்குமார் பொன்னுசாமி in Tamil) is a Technical Lead, who is working in healthcare domain for an India based Multi-National Company. He started his career with PACS (Picture Archiving and Communication System), later he started the Security Investigation for Cloud Computing with healthcare specialization, especially on the DICOM data transfer in cloud. Dinesh also worked with the image registration for the MRI scan, after the successful completion of investigation in MIST (Media Integrated Standard Toolkit) used for image registration. He works with IHE Standards, HL7 Messages, OpenATNA, Vendor Neutral Archive which supports Cross Enterprise Document Sharing. Meanwhile he contributes to Wikipedia and its sister projects along with his valuable contribution towards to Tamil Wikipedia including DICOM, PACS and lot more.
